name: Bakersfield Flying Club, Inc.
about: Bakersfield Flying Club, Inc., established in 2011, is a premier flying club dedicated to general aviation. It offers a comprehensive range of flight training programs, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications. The club is staffed by highly-qualified, FAA-certified instructors who provide training tailored to individual needs and schedules. Members have access to a well-maintained fleet of IFR-equipped Cessna aircraft and a full-motion simulator. The club also hosts safety seminars, group fly-outs, and social events, fostering a community of pilots and aviation enthusiasts. Whether you're a novice or an experienced pilot, Bakersfield Flying Club provides the resources and support to achieve your aviation goals.
